descriptions.stripe: keys required for stripe authentication, see https://stripe.com/docs/payments/checkout/fulfill-orders
descriptions.stripe.signingSecret: this is available in your Dashboard's webhook settings once you run the stripe CLI service
descriptions.stripe.port: the port your listening service will run on
descriptions.mailgun: keys required for mailgun authentication, see https://www.npmjs.com/package/nodemailer-mailgun-transport
descriptions.mailgun.key: your sending api key, available at https://app.mailgun.com/app/sending/domains/{DOMAIN_NAME}/sending-keys
descriptions.mailgun.domain: domain that emails are sending to, available at https://app.mailgun.com/mg/sending/domains or https://app.eu.mailgun.com/mg/sending/domains
descriptions.mailgun.domain.continued: you can use a sandboxed domain in testing, but remember to add authorized recipient (required)
descriptions.mailgun.host: For USA region you should use api endpoint api.mailgun.net for EU region use api.eu.mailgun.net
